meanings.sent1: She guided the lost hiker back to the trail.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide guided the group through the museum.
meanings.sent3: The GPS device guided the car to a dead-end street, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition guided her to make the right choice in a difficult situation.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse beam guided ships safely through the rocky waters.

meanings.definition: Lead or accompany someone in a particular direction
meanings.sent1: The teacher guided the students to the library for research.
meanings.sent2: The parent guided the child across the busy street.
meanings.sent3: The friendly dog guided the toddler back to the playground.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music guided him towards a career in composing.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the night sky guided the travelers on their journey.

meanings.definition: Assist or advise someone in making decisions or solving problems
meanings.sent1: The counselor guided the student in choosing the right college.
meanings.sent2: The mentor guided the entrepreneur in developing a business plan.
meanings.sent3: The magic eight ball guided the player to a surprising outcome.
meanings.sent4: Her experience in the field guided her to offer valuable insights.
meanings.sent5: The wise elder guided the community through challenging times.
